system.sustained:
Make Opposed Willpower Test vs Psy Rating number of targets within range. If winning test vs individual, can make them believe a non-ludicrous lie for Psy Rating Minutes, or alternative attack a random target within weapon/movement range.
Example of appropriate lies would be: Convincing a target they are someone else, that a target should report to their superiors immediately, etc. However a lie such as convincing the target they are falling when they are on solid group would be too much.
